entry.title: A FEW STILL WITHOUT POWER FOLLOWING MONDAY STORMS
entry.summary: February 25, 2025 4:00 a.m. A few are still without power as of early Tuesday morning, after storms hit the Umpqua Valley on Monday. entry.title: Joann Fabrics to Close All Remaining Locations Following Bankruptcy Filing
entry.summary: Joann Fabrics will close all remaining stores in 2025 after filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy. The 80-year-old craft retailer faced declining sales and supply chain issues. Store-closing sales are expected in the coming weeks.

entry.title: Roseburg Enjoys Warmest Day of 2025 So Far
entry.summary: Roseburg hit 65°F on February 22, making it the warmest day of 2025 so far. While warm, it didn’t break the 2002 record of 70°F. The record low for the date remains 28°F, set in 2019. Locals enjoyed the mild weather as spring approaches.
